name: Crispy Baked Kale Chips with Olive Oil (Low-Carb Snack)
description: Indulge in a guilt-free snack with these Kale Chips. Perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, these chips offer a healthy alternative without compromising on taste. Enjoy the crunchy goodness of kale transformed into a delightful snack that fits perfectly into your health-conscious lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the kale and thoroughly dry it with a salad spinner or a clean towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Tear the kale leaves into bite-sized pieces, discarding the thick stems.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, massage the kale with olive oil and salt to evenly coat the leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the kale in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the edges are lightly browned and the kale is crisp. Keep a close eye to prevent burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Let the kale chips cool on the sheet for a few minutes before serving to crisp up further.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
